name: Google Sheets Tool
semantic_context: Read, update and write data to Google Sheets
natural_language_description: 这是 Google Sheets Tool 节点。主要用于: Read, update and write data to Google Sheets

preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleSheets.displayName: Manage tasks in Google Sheets using our pre-built
preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleSheets.name: preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleSheets
preBuiltAgentsCalloutGoogleSheets.natural_language_description: 参数名: Manage tasks in Google Sheets using our pre-built

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Read, update and write data to Google Sheets
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Read, update and write data to Google Sheets | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: sheet

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create

documentId.name: documentId
documentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Document | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

sheetName.name: sheetName
sheetName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sheet | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

dataMode.name: dataMode
dataMode.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Mode | 作用: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row | 默认值: defineBelow
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data to Columns (值: autoMapInputData) - Use when node input properties match destination column names
Map Each Column Below (值: defineBelow) - Set the value for each destination column
Nothing (值: nothing) - Do not send anything

autoMapNotice.displayName: In this mode, make sure the incoming data is named the same as the columns in your Sheet. (Use an 'Edit Fields' node before this node to change it if required.)
autoMapNotice.name: autoMapNotice
autoMapNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: In this mode, make sure the incoming data is named the same as the columns in your Sheet. (Use an 'Edit Fields' node before this node to change it if required.)

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Values to Send | 默认值: {}

columns.name: columns
columns.natural_language_description: 参数名: Columns | 默认值: {'mappingMode': 'defineBelow', 'value': None} | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: locale (值: None) - The locale of the spreadsheet in one of the following formats: 				 					en (639-1) 					fil (639-2 if no 639-1 format exists) 					en_US (combination of ISO language an country)
autoRecalc (值: None) - Cell recalculation interval options

clear.name: clear
clear.natural_language_description: 参数名: Clear | 作用: What to clear | 默认值: wholeSheet

keepFirstRow.name: keepFirstRow
keepFirstRow.natural_language_description: 参数名: Keep First Row | 默认值: False

startIndex.name: startIndex
startIndex.natural_language_description: 参数名: Start Column | 作用: The column to delete | 默认值: A

rowsToDelete.name: rowsToDelete
rowsToDelete.natural_language_description: 参数名: Number of Rows to Delete | 默认值: 1

columnsToDelete.name: columnsToDelete
columnsToDelete.natural_language_description: 参数名: Number of Columns to Delete | 默认值: 1

range.name: range
range.description: The table range to read from or to append data to. See the Google documentation for the details. If it contains multiple sheets it can also be added like this: "MySheet!A:F"
range.natural_language_description: 参数名: Range | 作用: The table range to read from or to append data to. See the Google documentation for the details. If it contains multiple sheets it can also be added like this: "MySheet!A:F" | 默认值: A:F | (必填项)

title.name: title
title.natural_language_description: 参数名: Title | 作用: The title of the spreadsheet

toDelete.name: toDelete
toDelete.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Delete | 作用: What to delete | 默认值: rows

numberToDelete.name: numberToDelete
numberToDelete.natural_language_description: 参数名: Number of Columns to Delete | 默认值: 1

filtersUI.name: filtersUI
filtersUI.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}

combineFilters.name: combineFilters
combineFilters.description: How to combine the conditions defined in "Filters": AND requires all conditions to be true, OR requires at least one condition to be true
combineFilters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Combine Filters | 作用: How to combine the conditions defined in "Filters": AND requires all conditions to be true, OR requires at least one condition to be true | 默认值: AND
available_options: AND (值: AND) - Only rows that meet all the conditions are selected
OR (值: OR) - Rows that meet at least one condition are selected

columnToMatchOn.name: columnToMatchOn
columnToMatchOn.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
columnToMatchOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Column to match on | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | 提示: Used to find the correct row to update. Doesn't get changed.

valueToMatchOn.displayName: Value of Column to Match On
valueToMatchOn.name: valueToMatchOn
valueToMatchOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Value of Column to Match On

sheetsUi.name: sheetsUi
sheetsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sheets | 默认值: {}
